nodes.text: Grimtaash was a being from Alderaanian myth. According to legend, the spirit of the Molator Grimtaash protected the royal house of Alderaan from corruption and betrayal.
Grimtaash, or a similar Molator, was one of the holomonsters on a dejarik board on the Millennium Falcon.
Dark Nest II: The Unseen Queen uses the alternate spelling "grimtassh".
